Flint.West Second Street\u2013Swartz Creek Bri: The West Second Street–Swartz Creek Bridge in Flint, Michigan, carries West Second Street over Swartz Creek. It is a 70-foot Luten arch bridge completed in early 1920. It was engineered in 1919 by the Flint City Engineer's Office using Luten's patented arches under a royalty agreement.
